S1.title: Talk no Jutsu
S1.description: Attacks target horizontally, range 1, Target's turn gauge is set to 0; ATK x1.

S2.title: Swing
S2.description: Attacks target in front with Atk x0.5. Target's defense is halved.

S3.title: Rasengan
S3.description: Attacks target in front with Atk x1, ignore target's defense.

S1.title: Fish Blessing
S1.description: Heal one ally (including self), scale with ATK; ATK x1.

S2.title: Sakura's Fist
S2.description: Increases all allies' ATK +1/DEF +1 for 2 turns.

S3.title: Sakura Cut Hair
S3.description: Increases all team members' SPEED +2 for 2 turns.

S1.title: Big Shuriken
S1.description: Throw a shuriken horizontally. The first target it struck is dealt damage.

S2.title: Punpaksa
S2.description: Throw a bomb anywhere on the map. Deal ATK x0.5

S3.title: Fire in the Hole
S3.description: Attacks all tiles horizontally, range 4. ATK x0.5

S1.title: You Are Weak
S1.description: Pull a character within 3 tiles horizontally toward self.

S3.title: Sorry, This is it
S3.description: Attack target with ATK x1.5. Target is pushed 1 tile away.

S1.title: Hand Tongue
S1.description: Attack target horizontally or diagonally, range 1; ATK x1.5.

S2.title: Explosion is Art
S2.description: Throw a bomb horizontally, range 4. Deal damage as a plus sign. ATK x0.75.

S3.title: Ultimate Art
S3.description: Attacks all tiles vertically. All characters in range are damaged. ; ATK x1.

S1.title: Slide Punch
S1.description: Moves 2 tiles toward target then attacks target with ATK x1.

S3.title: Back to reality
S3.description: Attacks horizontally, range 1, then moves backward 1 tile. ATK x1.
